title: Pedro Neves named Morningstar Visiting Scholar in Digital Media Design | UIC - School of Design
text: Morningstar is a global financial services firm founded by enrepreneur, Joe Mansueto, and headquartered in Chicago. A company known for bringing the power of design to the financial services industry, Morningstar is the single largest employer of UIC School of Design graduates. Our relationship was established by Philip Burton, Professor and Founding Chair of UIC Graphic Design, who has served as a consultat to Morningstar since 1992, and advanced by David Williams, Morningstar's Global Head of Design.
Image: The Affordances of Scripting Typography, Pedro Neves, UIC HGK Basel MDes Thesis, 2018
